name: RateIntegration
overview: RateIntegration, Inc. provides revenue lifecycle management and loyalty solutions. Its solutions include RMS 3.0 Modeling Server, a price modeling solution; RLM 3.0 Loyalty Manager, which provides a centralized area for establishing policies, and viewing customer profiles and data from other silos; ARS 3.0 Advanced Rating Server for production pricing, rating, or real-time charging; and RAS 3.0 Assurance Server revenue assurance, cost assurance, and real-time revenue monitoring. The company serves telecom industry, including wire-line, wireless, cable, WiFi, and Wimax; entertainment industry, such as IPTV, music, video, gaming, and content; Internet industry, including B2B commerce, advertising, and auctions; utilities, such as SaaS, utility computing, IT services, and de-regulated utility contracts; and financial industry, including insurance, retail, and commercial banking. RateIntegration was founded in 1999 and is based in Durham, North Carolina.
